rukus.text: 23|78|geubunkkeseo neohuiege cheong-gaggwa sigaggwa choggag-eul jusyeossgeonman neohuineun gamsahaneunde insaeghadoda
23|79|neohuileul jisang-e beonsigke hasin bun-i geubun-isini neohuineun geubunkkelo jibhabdoelila
23|80|saengmyeong-eul jusigo as-agasineun bundo geubun-isimyeo najgwa bam-eul dalli hayeo jusineun bundo geubun-isigeoneul neohuineun alji moshaneunyo
23|81|geuleona geudeul-eun seonjodeul-i mal han geosgwa daleul ba eobs-euni
23|82|uliga jug-eo heulg-gwa ppyeoga doeeoss eul ttae dasi buhwaldoel su issneunyo la go geudeul-i malhadoda
23|83|ileohan il-eun uliege geuli go uli seonjodeul-egedo yagsogdoeeossji man sillo igeos-eun yes yaegie bulgwaha da malhani
23|84|illeogalodoe daejiwa geu an-e issneun modeun geos-i nuguege soghayeo issneunyo neohuiga man-il algo issdamyeon malhala
23|85|geudeul-eun malhalila hananimkke gwisoghayeo issdoda illeogalodoe geulaedo neohuineun gyohun-eul sulaghaji anhneunyo
23|86|illeogalodoe chilcheon-ui ju-in-eun nugu-imyeo gwonjaui ju-in-eun nugunyago hal ttae
23|87|hananimkkae gwisogdoeeo issdoda lago geudeul-i malhalini illeogalodoeneohuineun geulaedo dulyeowohaji anhneunyo
23|88|illeogalodoe modeun geos-eul jugwan hasineun bun-i nugusinyo tto modeun geos-eul bohohasina bohobadji anihan bun-eun nugusinyo man-il neohuideul-i a neun jadeul-ilamyeon malhala hani
23|89|hananim isila geudeul-i malha lini illeogalodoe geuleomyeon eojjihayeoneohuineun hyeonhogdoego issneunyo
23|90|hananim-i geudeul-ege jinlileul jueossgeonman sillo geudeul-eun geojis-eul mal haneun jadeul-ila

23|91|hananim-eun jasig-eul duji ani hasyeoss-eumyeo geubun-eul daejeoghal eotteohan sindo eobsnola man-il daleun manh-eun sindeul-i iss-eossdamyeon gag sindeul-eun jagiga changjohan geos-eul ppaeas-a gass-eul geos-imyeo daleun sin-eul jibaehaess-eulila hananim-iyeogeudeul-i myosahaneun geos-eul chowolhayeo hollo yeong-gwangbad-eusoseo
23|92|geubun-eun boiji anhneun geosgwa boineun geosdo da asineun bun-isini geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-i biyuhalyeoneun geos wie gyesinila
